## secretManagerStore variable

Store that retrieves data from, and persists data to, Secret Manager.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
secretManagerStore: <T>({ secret_manager, secret_name, should_disable_older_enabled_versions }: Config) => Store<T>
```
